series_title: Market Conduct Examination Files - Record Copy, Final Report
series_description: This series documents the Commission's examination of insurance company market conduct, financial status and other matters as required by
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after closure of examination, then transfer records to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention (Code, § 38.2-1321). Public access to record copy is unrestricted (Code, 38.2-1306).

series_title: Market Conduct Examination Files - Other Copies, Supporting Documentation and Ancillary Information
series_description: This series documents the Commission's examination of insurance company market conduct, financial status and other matters as required by
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after closure of examination, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page (Code, § 38.2-1320.5).
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, §§ 38.2-1317 and 1317.1. This series includes information not included with the record copy of the final report.

series_title: Market Conduct: Premium Finance Company Forms
series_description: This series documents the filing of agreement forms by insurance premium financers and subsequent approval by the Commission. Refer to
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after superseded, then destroy.
